department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 課程目標是舉辦一系列的認知神經科學領域相關專題演講,邀請各個機構的講者提供相關領域的演講及研究簡報。學生們需要出席這些專題講座,與講者互動並積極參與討論。
goal.en: The goal of the course is a seminar series where speakers from various institutions are invited to give lectures and presentations on topics related to the fields covered by the course. The students are expected to attend these seminars, interact with the speakers, and actively participate in discussions.

outline.ch: 課程內容圍繞著主辦這些專題講座。學生們有團體項目,包括與講者溝通、寄發通知信件、主持講座(準備飲水、介紹講者、主持問答環節)以及在講座中提問。此外,也有個人項目,包括出席專題講座、在講座中提問以及參加演講後的會議。
outline.en: The content of the course revolves around hosting these seminars. There are group requirements for the students, such as communicating with the speakers, sending notification emails, hosting the lecture (preparing water, introducing the speaker, chairing the Q＆A session), and asking questions during the seminar. Additionally, there are individual requirements, including attending the seminars, asking questions during the seminars, and attending post-seminar meetings with the speakers.

textbook.en: Reading materials assigned by the seminar speakers

gradMethod.ch:
基本分數: 60分
    團體項目(每組最多可獲15分):
        與講者溝通
        寄發通知信件
        主持講座(準備飲水、介紹講者、主持問答環節)
        在講座中提問(若無提問則每組扣5分)
    個人項目:
        出席專題講座(無正當理由缺席每次扣5分)
        在講座中提問(每次加3分)
        參加演講後會議(每次加1分,最多5分)
gradMethod.en:
The grading requirements are as follows:

    Baseline score: 60 points
    Group requirements (maximum +15 points for each hosting group):
        Communicating with the speaker
        Sending notification emails
        Hosting the lecture (preparing water, introducing the speaker, chairing the Q＆A session)
        Asking questions (or -5 points for each hosting group if no questions are asked)
    Individual requirements:
        Attending the seminar (-5 points for each absence without proper request)
        Asking questions (+3 points for each question asked)
        Attending the post-seminar meeting (+1 point for each attendance, maximum of 5 points)
